title: #278 - Immanuel Kant Part 2: The Critique
itunes:title: #278 - Immanuel Kant Part 2: The Critique
description: In part-two of their Kant trilogy, Connor does his best to stay awake and engaged while Dan explains one of the more complex and influential books in modern philosophy: The Critique of Pure Reason. Hopefully, you all like terminology because the first half of this episode covers the damn table of contents!
